article_text:
Meridian police say the Gang Unit has taken another suspect into custody and charged in connection with a September shooting.

19-year-old Alicia Parks has been charged with accessory after the fact relating to a shooting that happened September 23rd. Parks is the second person to be arrested and charged with this shooting. In that incident, police say a 13-year-old was hit once and sent to the hospital.
